title: Investigation of the photocatalytic activity of magnetically recoverable g-C3N4/CoFe2O4/Bi2MoO6 particles for purifying tetracycline antibiotics: synthesis, characterization, ecotoxicity analysis, and plant toxicity test
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15302-15318
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01593B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zhiwei Tang, Changchao Hu, Rui Zhang, Junrong Yu, Lu Cai, Ze Yang, Xingwang Wang, Shiqiang Wu, Desheng Liu
To purify water polluted by tetracycline antibiotics, a new visible light-driven magnetically recoverable photocatalyst, g-C3N4/CoFe2O4/Bi2MoO6, was prepared in this study, and it effectively removed tetracycline antibiotics.
